tables.share:
CREATE TABLE `:table_prefix_share` (
  `share_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL,
  `poster_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `user_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `parent_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `parent_user_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `feed_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `parent_share_id` bigint(20) unsigned DEFAULT '0',
  `poster_type` varchar(32) NOT NULL,
  `parent_type` varchar(32) NOT NULL,
  `about_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `about_type` varchar(32) DEFAULT '',
  `privacy_type` smallint(5) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `privacy_value` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `like_count` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `comment_count` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `share_count` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `params_text` text,
  `privacy_text` text,
  `people_count` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `story` text NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`share_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
